import React,{useState} from 'react' import styles from './ListPlayers.module.css' import AddPlayer from './AddPlayer' function ListPlayers({players,doRerender,team_id}) { const [add, setAdd] = useState(false) console.log(players) const listplayers = players.map( player =>
{player.player_name} {player.player_city}, {player.player_state}
) return (
NameFrom
{listplayers} {add ?
setAdd(!add)} style={{float: 'right'}}/>
: setAdd(!add)} style={{cursor:'pointer'}}>Add New player}
) } export default ListPlayers
